festival.introText:
Boundary returns once again in 2023 on Saturday 30th September. The biggest commercial festival on the south coast spans across a 60 miles radius and nestled between the crest of the Downs and the City with the sea below. Boundary promises to push your festival going experience right to the limit, with the launch of their fourth stage within the Boneyard area*. 

Taking the best of Brighton’s creative energy, lust for life and generosity of spirit, Boundary Brighton is a festival made up of four stages showcasing the best in music, delicious local food, a vintage fair and other unexpected treats. The festival works with and supports local brands and venues, offering over 350 jobs and highlighting the Brighton spirit. 

Both local universities within Brighton are basing their entire fresher’s week festivities around Boundary Brighton 2023. The festival has offered around 5000 tickets to each university to help support the running of each student union. 

Saving the best for last, Boundary has officially been labelled THE festival to close the incredible festival season for 2023. After selling out for the past five-year, Boundary Brighton is expected to close the 2023 festival season with a huge bang and transcend your previous conceptions of an immersive festival experience. 

Please go to https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

reviews.title: Review of Boundary Brighton 2022
reviews.body: amazing security. the special squad security guys were absolutely amazing and genuinly nice people

reviews.title: Review of Boundary Brighton 2022
reviews.body: Thought the placement of tents was amazing and that house tent was outstanding

faqs.question: How do I get to Boundary Brighton Festival?
faqs.answer:
By Car - We have  a drop off point in the Amex car park – do not try to get into Stanmer Park or drop off on the A27; you will be moved on.

By Bus - The Boundary event operation will pick up from the Old Steine, Brighton. Check the Brighton & Hove bus timetable. Other bus services that gets you close to Stanmer Park are : 25/25X/28/29/78

We run FREE shuttle buses from Stanmer Park back to Brighton at Old Steine. This will be the quickest, cheapest and easiest way to get back to Brighton afterwards.

By Coach

Big Green Coach are operating day return coach services for Boundary Brighton from 15 locations. All coaches arrive for gates opening and depart only after all the music has finished. You can purchase your travel below. Choose your departure location from: Bexhill-on-Sea, Bognor Regis, Burgess Hill, Chichester, Crawley, Eastbourne, East Grinstead, Hailsham, Hastings, Haywards Heath, London (Croydon), Portsmouth, Southampton, Uckfield & Worthing.

By Rail - The closest train station is Falmer. Falmer station closes at 21:00 – no trains to Brighton will stop after that time.

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

faqs.question: How much are Boundary Brighton Festival tickets?
faqs.answer:
Please see the tickets section for more info.

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

faqs.question: Does Boundary Brighton Festival have onsite camping?
faqs.answer:
No, Boundary Brighton is a non camping festival so camping equipment is not needed.

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

faqs.question: When is Boundary Brighton Festival 2023?
faqs.answer:
Boundary Brighton returns to Stanmer Park, Brighton on Saturday 30th September 2023.

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

faqs.question: Are pre-payment plan tickets available?
faqs.answer:
There are no payment plan tickets currently available.

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

faqs.question: Where is Boundary Brighton Festival?
faqs.answer:
Boundary Brighton takes place at Stanmer Park, Lewes Road, Brighton, BN1 9SE.

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

faqs.question: What happens If I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer:
Unfortunately we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent.

 

Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

faqs.question: Can I bring my own food and drink into Boundary Brighton Festival?
faqs.answer:
You are not permitted to bring your own food or drinks into the festival. If you have specific dietary requirements, please email info@boundarybrighton.com in advance

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

faqs.question: Does the name on my ticket matter?
faqs.answer:
No. We won't check the name on your ticket, so you're free to give it to a friend or family member without any issue.

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

faqs.question: Does Boundary Brighton Festival have any age restrictions?
faqs.answer:
You must be 18 or older to attend Boundary Brighton.

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

faqs.question: When is last entry to Boundary Brighton Festival?
faqs.answer:
Sadly, we're unable to allow entry after 4 pm unless agreed upon beforehand or if your ticket says otherwise.

 

See https://boundarybrighton.com/info/ for full info.

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Boundary Brighton 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: The organisers need to seriously sort out their stage capacities, very poorly thought out. They refused entry to one stage at 6pm due to overcrowding (donât put popular acts on the stage with the smallest capacity)

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Boundary Brighton 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: my only complaint is that the queueing system was the most dangerous I have witnessed in 30 years of raving.

reviewsDisplayFour.title: Review of Boundary Brighton 2022
reviewsDisplayFour.body: Amazing music, supercharge was by far the best stage. Everyone was on pingers tho

news.title: Boundary Brighton announce Phase 2 of this year's epic lineup
news.summary: The South Coast’s biggest commercial electronic dance music festival will welcome the likes of Friction, Harriet Jaxxon and Skream, amongst many others, to Stanmer Park in Brighton this September

news.title: Boundary Brighton Festival releases phase one of lineup
news.summary: Following its biggest party to date in 2021, the mammoth electronic event is back this September with a host of recently announced dance titans in tow. Continue reading to discover more...

news.title: First release tickets for Boundary Brighton now on sale
news.summary: Boundary Brighton have announced that the first wave of tickets for their 2022 edition are on sale now.
